data.title: What is New York known for?
data.meta_description: The Big Apple is known for its iconic landmarks, Broadway, and amazing food.
data.text:
From the Empire State Building to the Statue of Liberty, New York has some of the world’s most recognizable landmarks — best viewed from the air.

This iconic theater district is home to over 40 theaters showing the world’s most popular musicals and plays like The Phantom of the Opera, The Lion King, and Wicked.

Check out world-famous museums like The Museum of Modern Art (MoMA) and The Metropolitan Museum of Art (where the annual Met Gala is held.)

Escape the concrete jungle in one of New York’s green oases. Locals love Central Park, the High Line, and Brooklyn Bridge Park.
